text: Dassault Aviation is an international French aircraft manufacturer of military and commercial jets, and is member of the Dassault Group.Avions, journaux, vin… à quoi ressemble l’empire laissé par Serge Dassault ? It was founded in 1929 by Marcel Bloch as Société des Avions Marcel Bloch or "MB". After the World War II, Marcel Bloch changed his name to Marcel Dassault, and the company name was changed on 20 January 1947 to Avions Marcel Dassault.Du Mirage au Rafale en passant par le Falcon : les multiples facettes de Dassault Aviation The Dassault Aviation Group has been managed by Éric Trappier since January 9, 2013.Dassault Names Eric Trappier as Chief to Succeed Edelstenne == References == ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1929 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in France
title: Dassault Aviation
